name: The Manor-Charming Villa Nishat Srinagar Kashmir

reviews.comments: The stay was quite comfortable and host is very accommodating. Would definitely recommend it.
reviews.response: Thank you, Do visit us again.

reviews.comments: It was great staying at The Manor, the place was neat and clean alongside with lovely rooms which we stayed attached. The view was breathtaking and I'd definitely recommend it to others.
reviews.response: Thank you Ayushya, looking forward to host U again.

reviews.comments: Beautiful place to stay in Srinagar calm and quiet. However, never make a mistake to think it's an Hotel.

Dr Bashir and his wife were very warm and Welcoming! They were flexible even when our plans changed. Place is close to major attractions in Srinagar! Kashmir is known for it’s hospitality coz of people like Dr Bashir!

The place is huge and very comfortable. It is located outaide the main city crowd uphill which provides a peaceful stay. Mr. & Mrs. Bashir are very nice and helping people. They have a nice set up which provides you a homely environment. Ample space for kids to play. Mr. Bashir stayed with us for all four days but never gave us the feeling of owner. However, the wifi was not available for our whole stay due to cable break. Mr. Bashir tried hard to mend it but it was not restored. I will definetly recommend this place to those who need a peaceful and comfortable saty.
reviews.response: Thanks for review. Sorry for WiFi which was disrupted by harsh winds. - the Jio WiFi ’ was restored next day only by the Jio company, who took their own time. Looking forward to host u again.

reviews.comments:
Absolutely Stunning property with a perfect view. We had booked the property for my entire family of 5 for a relaxed vacation & our stay was exactly that. Dr. Bashir is an extremely humble host & ensured that we had a pleasant stay. He actively interacts with you & goes beyond to ensure your stay is comfortable & without glitches. The property is exactly the way you in see in the photos posted - perfect. It is located just couple of kms off Dal Lake which makes it perfect for people travelling for sight seeing.
Ishber is one of the premium location & you can expect absolute peace of mind in terms of security & privacy. It has access to good restaurants nearby. The property is ideal if you are travelling with family - as it just feels home away from home.
reviews.response: Thank you . Looking forward to host you again .

reviews.comments:
Property is good in terms of view, construction and well maintained. All the required thing's you will find in bungalow. In Kitchen all the things available. it's 1 km meter far from main area. you will feel alone when you reach there. security system is good. Mr. Bashir and Mr. Parvesh is supportive. In Kashmir to much power supply problem. In night time almost 5 to 6 hrs power cut observed. UPS Power backup is there but it not that much sufficient to hot water gear and hot blanket. In morning time you will not get electricity. Just go outside without taking bath.
Over all experience is nice.

We had a very comfortable stay at Dr Bashir’s Manor.
This place is centrally located , walking distance to Dal lake, and Nishat n Shalimar Garden, but for outsiders like us, coming from metro cities weather can make it little difficult to walk, basic provisions are available in the vicinity, you would buy fresh Kashmiri bread from the bakery near by.
Dr. Bashir made us feel very much at home, he has a beautiful house which is done very tastefully. We enjoyed our stay !
A wonderful place to stay with spacious rooms, comfortable living area, well equipped kitchen and lush green lawns, though it is situated a little away from the city/ Dal Lake area.
reviews.response: Thank you Mr Manish for your comments. See you again in future.

reviews.comments: Dr Bashir made us feel unwanted guests. He repeatedly gave us warning sort of instructions about use of  his bathroom shower  cabinet which was so insulting. Both Mrs n Mr  Bashir are not at all good hosts. Very negative vibes.
reviews.response: This is utterly false and biased review. Snehal was only told once about the use of bathing cabinet and hand shower ( when she said it’s not working. One of her companion had ankle injury , she was referred to proper Orthopadician and inquired frequently about well being.It was clear that they are not used to home stay. She probably has a agenda, on which she is  are working. Utterly disappointing. Be careful about this lady and her group.

photos.caption: The Manor Victorian Mansion Ishber Nishat Srinagar
Sprawling lawn in two levels in front of the Mansion
King size Double Bedroom with attached Bathroom- green ambiance. Bedroom No 3
Drawing room spacious with fire place.
The Golden hue of Autumn - trees shed their golden buddies-leaves
Dal lake - only 1 km away from property.

primaryHost.about: A professional, ventured into hosting .Now I have  experience of more than 5 years .

sectionedDescription.access: Guest have access between 11:30 to 14:30. In special situations late or early access is allowed,Safe car parking inside for2 cars.Street parking available.They can access all common spaces.
sectionedDescription.description:
Our classic and comfortable  Double Beded 4 Bedroom (Entire property for 8 guests), has imposing entrance (majestic pillars ) gives a true feeling of Victorian area. It has common Modular big kitchen  with Dinning Room. A living room and a posh Drawing room, common to all guests.Conveniently located from ( 2 kms)  Nishat Garden and world famous Dal lake,Children above 12 years  will need extra bed , Bathrooms are electronically fitted with bathing cabinets orJocose. Children will be instructed.

The Manor  is located in tranquil as  Serene location away from away from hustle and bustle on markets and noisy of traffic on foothills of Zabarvan  range.. Beautiful Lawns, Stylish Living room with HD TV , Posh drawing Room , Dinning Room and safe car parking. Modular Kitchen with all essential gadgets.Bathrooms have hot tub or  electric cabins .

Guest have access between 11:30 to 14:30. In special situations late or early access is allowed,Safe car parking inside for2 cars.Street parking available.They can access all common spaces.

Any time  with house keeper but the customers  can communicate with the Manager on mobile as and when needed, with owner on WhatsApp

Beautiful landscape, Serene and tranquil surroundings. It has Mountain View and lush green Lawns.The house is at peace with nature.

Car available on hire round the clock . World famous Dal lake / Heritage Mughal Gardens,Nishat Garden built during Moghul emperors time , can be reached within 10 minutes . Market for essential commodities Great Deals is just half kilometer away.

Guest should preferably have their transport available to commute for shopping and for sight seeing if they won't to do it on their own. Instead it can be arranged by house keeper on payment if requested earlier. Modular Kitchen is available,used only when guests request. The food can be cooked for guests on payment if they order in advance before check in or home delivered from restaurants if ordered 3 hours before on their menu and prices All this will make stay comfortable and enjoyable. Cheers
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
- Please take care and look after the property as you care for your own home.
- Quiet hours- 10 pm to 7 am .                                   -  Sorry No wet , soiled or dirty shoes inside home ,rack provided at entrances.
- Smoking is allowed in  private rooms or in lawn . NOT in common areas like living or drawing rooms.which is used by all other occupants living in the house.                                                                       -DRINKING allowed in Private rooms only, NOT allowed in common areas or in lawns.                                                      -Eating - Lunch Dinner is allowed in    the designated areas only .                                - Washing machine use allowed, cost per cycle (5.5kg load)  Rs 250 , which includes cost of electric energy, detergent and ironing , Machine wear and tear ,DIY (Do it yourself ).                                                      - You May use  Modular Kitchen DIY but Cost of cooking gas will be Rs 250 per day for 3 meals or Rs 200 BF/ Dinner.                                                         -Cleaning will be done just at just before you enter and once you leave .Rest DIY.                                        -A Govt approved ID Electronic ( on WhatsApp) to be submitted on arrival ( Govt requirement) of all Adult guests,                                 -Wishing you a happy, comfortable and a lovely time. Cheers
sectionedDescription.interaction: Any time  with house keeper but the customers  can communicate with the Manager on mobile as and when needed, with owner on WhatsApp

listingExpectations.addedDetails: There is a local shepard dog pup (about 5 months old) staying at the property. He belongs to the caretaker of the house. He is a lovely little chap, but gets a bit too excited when seeing many people (loves jumping on people)!
listingExpectations.title: Pet(s) live on property

listingExpectations.addedDetails: limited hot water depending on local load shedding (electricity goes out 3 to 4 hours a day) and the mobile signal reception  may be weak depending on your service provider.
listingExpectations.title: Amenity limitations

listingExpectations.addedDetails: There is spiral staircase that takes guests to the first floor, where most of the rooms are located. There are also steps outside the main door, that give access to the garden.
listingExpectations.title: Must climb stairs
Security deposit - if you damage the home, you may be charged up to $120

listingExpectations.addedDetails: We have 8 security cameras covering all 4 outside sides of the Residential House and main gates and front road. They will be on during the stay of guest.
listingExpectations.title: Surveillance or recording devices on property
